title: Implement Dtrsyl - Triangular Sylvester Solver

**Purpose**: Solve op(A)*X + X*op(B) = scale*C where A,B are quasi-triangular

**Acceptance Criteria**:
- [ ] Implement lapack/gonum/dtrsyl.go matching Go signature in SPEC.md:97-104
- [ ] Implement lapack/testlapack/dtrsyl.go with:

  - [ ] 1x1 and 2x2 block cases
  - [ ] Random quasi-triangular matrices
  - [ ] Pathological (Wilkinson, Kahan) matrices
  - [ ] Near-singular cases (shared eigenvalues)
  - [ ] Residual: ||op(A)*X + X*op(B) - scale*C|| / (||A||*||X|| + ||X||*||B|| + ||C||) < tol
- [ ] Uses Dlasy2 for small systems (exists)
- [ ] Simple scaling to avoid overflow, return scale factor

title: Dgges Phase B: Core Algorithm (No Sorting)
description:
Implement core Dgges algorithm without sorting.

**Subtasks:**
1. Scale matrices A, B if needed (Dlascl)
2. Balance pair: Dggbal(PermuteScale, ...)
3. QR factorization of B: Dgeqrf
4. Apply Q^T to A: Dormqr(Left, Trans, ...)
5. Initialize VSL to identity if needed: Dlaset
6. Generate VSR from QR: Dlacpy + Dorgqr
7. Zero lower triangle of B
8. Reduce to Hessenberg-triangular: Dgghrd
9. QZ iteration: Dhgeqz
10. Back-transform: Dggbak
11. Undo scaling

**Workspace Layout:**
- work[0:n] - lscale (Dggbal output)
- work[n:2n] - rscale (Dggbal output)
- work[2n:3n] - tau (Dgeqrf output)
- work[3n:] - subroutine workspace

**Reference:** ~/.claude/plans/modular-growing-map.md

**Parent:** gonum-lqr (Dgges implementation)
close_reason: Core algorithm implemented and verified with Dhgeqz fix
